casebody.data:
In the Matter of J.T., et al. No. 155P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Beth A. Hall, Attorney Advocate, for Guardian ad Litem. Richard Croutharmel, for Mother. Peter Wood, for Father.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 657 S.E.2d 692.

*247The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of April 2008 by Petitioners (Cumberland County DSS & GAL) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
